# pause()

**Instance Method**

Pauses playback of the associated item.

## Declaration

```swift
func pause()
```

## Discussion

This method sets the value of the [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKAudioFilePlayer/rate] property to `0.0`.

## Configuring and Controlling Playback

- **play()**: Begins playback of the current item.
- **rate**: The current rate of playback.
